email_chain.subject: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Hope you're doing well. We have a vessel available for your iron ore shipment from Tubarao to Qingdao. Details:
- Cargo Size: 180,000 MT
- Incoterm: CIF
- Vessel: PACIFIC TRADER
- Freight Quote: $28/MT
- Laycan: 2023-10-20 to 2023-10-25

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the offer. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Can you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA? Also, is there any flexibility on the laycan?

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

PACIFIC TRADER has a DWT of 210,000 and LOA of 320m. We can adjust the laycan to 2023-10-22 to 2023-10-27. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the update. The adjusted laycan works for us. However, we would like to negotiate the freight rate to $25/MT. Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate?

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

We can meet you at $26/MT. Demurrage rate is $15,000 per day. Let me know if this is acceptable.

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen

email_chain.subject: Re: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

$26/MT and $15,000 demurrage rate per day are acceptable. Please proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Iron Ore Shipment Inquiry - Tubarao to Qingdao - Booking Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Laura,

Booking is confirmed. We will send the final documents shortly.

Best regards,
Alex Nguyen
